full_summary:
### Tender Notice: SQL Database Analyst

**Reference:** nb-S08F3

**Title:** SQL Database Analyst

**Contracting Entity:** Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC)

**Overview:**
The CRTC is seeking a Junior Database Analyst/IM Administrator on a part-time basis to support the Compliance and Enforcement (C&E) Sector with SQL analysis and data management. The selected candidate will work with an investigation team responsible for enforcing the Unsolicited Telecommunications Rules and Canada's anti-spam legislation (CASL).

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Provide SQL analysis and data management support to an investigation team
* Assist in managing and analyzing data related to alleged violations
* Contribute to enforcing the Unsolicited Telecommunications Rules and CASL

**Requirements:**

* Part-time position, 7.5 hours per week
* SQL analysis and data management expertise
* Experience with relational database management systems and stream processing

**Tender Information:**

* **Publication Date:** 2023-05-26
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-14T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-06-14
* **Tender Status:** Expired

**Attachments:**

Available on the solicitation package. Please refer to the following links:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5901/crtc23-0091---q-et-r---q-and-a-001.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5901/23-0091--spict-ddp--tbips-rfp.zip

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
Gatineau, Quebec

**Contact Information:**
Adriana Malikah Martel
Approvisionnements-Procurements@crtc.gc.ca
(873) 353-7195

Note that the rewritten text maintains the original information and structure, while presenting it in a more concise and professional format. The changes made include:

* Simplifying the title and adding a brief overview
* Breaking down the key responsibilities and requirements into bullet points
* Removing redundant or unnecessary information
* Improving sentence structure and grammar throughout the text
* Adding headings and formatting for better readability
* Maintaining the original information about
